node_oa_tooltip: The precipitation water that flows off the surface
node_precipitation_tooltip: The precipitation that has been set. In this case, it is a design precipitation
node_sfgf_tooltip:
FFPA: Flash Flood Prone Area
This is the area where the height or speed of flowing water could pose a danger
node_sfi_tooltip:
FFI: Flash Flood Index
The expected hazard class due to a flash flood
node_soil_moisture_tooltip: The moisture of the soil before the rain event
node_sri_tooltip:
HRI: Heavy Rain Index
The index class of the rain event
